bibl.title: Encomium papyrologiae. [En anglais.] Translated from Polish by Jakub Urbanik
bibl.seg: Józef Modrzejewski (Mélèze Modrzejewski), Encomium papyrologiae. [En anglais.] Translated from Polish by Jakub Urbanik.

Version of a speech delivered by Józef Mélèze Modrzejewski on 6 June 2011 during the ceremony of the renewal of his doctorate that took place in the Senate Hall of the University of Warsaw. - Pp. xxx-xxxii: Appendix. A Sale of slaves and a hire of a wet-nurse (P. Polit. Iud. 9, 20 June 132 BC).
